title: Add My Account page for customers to view orders

requirements.summary: Create a new 'My Account' page route at /account that displays the authenticated customer's order history with order IDs, dates, statuses, and total amounts
acceptanceCriteria: New route /account exists and is accessible to authenticated customers
Page displays a list of all orders for the logged-in customer
Each order shows order ID, order date, order status, and total amount
Orders are sorted by date (most recent first)

file_operations.description: Create My Account page component that fetches customer orders using the getMyOrders backend method from the authorization component. Display orders in a list with order ID, date (formatted from order ID), status placeholder (since status is not in backend Order type), and total amount. Sort orders by ID descending (most recent first). Use gradient styling consistent with the existing blue-cyan theme and Space Grotesk typography. Verify the authorization component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a new route for /account that renders the MyAccount page component. Place the route alongside existing routes, outside the AdminGuard protected section since this is a customer-facing page. Import the MyAccount component and wire it into the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Add a 'My Account' navigation link in the header that is visible only to authenticated non-admin users
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation link labeled 'My Account' appears in the header Layout component
Link is only visible when user is authenticated
Link is hidden for admin users (admins have separate Orders section)
Clicking the link navigates to /account page

file_operations.description: Add a 'My Account' navigation link in the header nav section. Position it between the existing navigation links and the cart button. Use useInternetIdentity hook to check authentication status and useIsAdmin hook to determine admin status. Show the link only when isAuthenticated is true and isAdmin is false. Link should navigate to /account route. Style consistently with existing nav links using the same gradient hover effects.

requirements.summary: From the My Account page, allow customers to click on any order to navigate to the existing order details page to view full order information including products ordered
acceptanceCriteria: Each order in the My Account list is clickable
Clicking an order navigates to /orders/:orderId using the existing OrderDetails page
The existing OrderDetails page displays complete order information including all products

file_operations.description: Make each order in the list clickable by wrapping order items in navigation elements or adding click handlers that navigate to /orders/:orderId route using the order's ID. Use appropriate cursor styling (cursor-pointer) and hover effects consistent with the gradient theme. The navigation should utilize the existing OrderDetails page without modifying it.

requirements.summary: Display a helpful message on the My Account page when the customer has no orders yet
acceptanceCriteria: Empty state message appears when customer has zero orders
Message encourages customer to browse products
Includes link or button to navigate back to the product catalog

file_operations.description: Add conditional rendering to display an empty state when the orders array is empty. Show a friendly message encouraging the customer to browse products, styled with the gradient theme. Include a button or link that navigates to the root route (/) where the product catalog is located. Center the empty state message on the page for visual balance.
